snippet: BOTTELL--Patricia Tarwid, 80, died peacefully at home on June 15, 2016. Born in New York City, she moved to Florida in 1995. She is survived by her husband Martin Bottell, two sisters Taicia Ryan of Fort Myers and Wanda Gomez of Bogota, Colombia and several nieces and nephews. Contributions may be made to the Patricia Bottell Foundation, c/o Ed Dancek, Ameriprise Financial Services, 209 Tabor Street, Punta Gorda, FL 33950. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BOTTELL--Patricia Tarwid, 80, died peacefully at home on June 15, 2016. Born in New York City, she moved to Florida in 1995. headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BOTTELL, PATRICIA TARWID
